bigshot

Class FastTrigInverse

  • java.lang.Object
    • bigshot.FastTrigInverse
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FastTrigInverse.FastAcos, FastTrigInverse.FastAtan

    public class FastTrigInverse
extends Object
    Fast inverse trigonometric functions based on lookup tables and linear interpolation between lookup table values.
